original_text: After Joshua had dismissed the Israelites, they went to take possession of the land, each to their own inheritance.
korean_text: 전에 여호수아가 백성을 보내매 이스라엘 자손이 각기 그들의 기업으로 가서 땅을 차지하였고

sentences.original_text: After Joshua had dismissed the Israelites
they went to take possession of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 땅을 차지하기 위해 갔고
